languages.text: "На мой вкус затея была не лишена изящества. Сплетение вечно страдающих и ненавидящих душ в одном клубке... полагаю, сами Эмпиреи нашептали предводительнице навигаторов столь восхитительную и издевательскую мысль".

"The idea was not without elegance, to my mind. The entanglement of eternally suffering and hating souls in one skein... I suppose the Empyrean itself must have whispered such a delightful and taunting idea to the leader of the Navigators."
languages.original_text: "На мой вкус затея была не лишена изящества. Сплетение вечно страдающих и ненавидящих душ в одном клубке... полагаю, сами Эмпиреи нашептали предводительнице навигаторов столь восхитительную и издевательскую мысль".

traits.locale_text: "The idea was not without elegance, to my mind. The entanglement of eternally suffering and hating souls in one skein... I suppose the Empyrean itself must have whispered such a delightful and taunting idea to the leader of the Navigators."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “在我看来，这个主意不失优雅。永恒的痛苦和仇恨交织在一起……令人愉悦，又颇具讽刺。我猜想，应该是至高天向导航者的领袖低声说出了这个主意。”
languages.original_text: "The idea was not without elegance, to my mind. The entanglement of eternally suffering and hating souls in one skein... I suppose the Empyrean itself must have whispered such a delightful and taunting idea to the leader of the Navigators."

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，这个主意不失优雅。永恒的痛苦和仇恨交织在一起……令人愉悦，又颇具讽刺。我猜想，应该是至高天向导航者的领袖低声说出了这个主意。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Sa méthode n'était pas dénuée d'élégance, je trouve. Associer une souffrance éternelle à des âmes emplies de haine... Voilà une idée des plus originales. À croire qu'elle lui a été chuchotée à l'oreille par nul autre que l'Empyrée. »
languages.original_text: "The idea was not without elegance, to my mind. The entanglement of eternally suffering and hating souls in one skein... I suppose the Empyrean itself must have whispered such a delightful and taunting idea to the leader of the Navigators."

traits.locale_text: « Sa méthode n'était pas dénuée d'élégance, je trouve. Associer une souffrance éternelle à des âmes emplies de haine... Voilà une idée des plus originales. À croire qu'elle lui a été chuchotée à l'oreille par nul autre que l'Empyréen lui-même. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Debo admitir que la idea no carece de elegancia. Entrelazar numerosas almas condenadas al sufrimiento y al odio eterno en una sola madeja... supongo el Empíreo debió de sugerirle una idea tan sublime como tentadora a la líder de los navegantes».
languages.original_text: "The idea was not without elegance, to my mind. The entanglement of eternally suffering and hating souls in one skein... I suppose the Empyrean itself must have whispered such a delightful and taunting idea to the leader of the Navigators."

traits.locale_text: «Debo admitir que la idea no carece de elegancia. Entrelazar numerosas almas condenadas al sufrimiento y al odio eterno en una sola madeja... supongo el Empíreo debió de sugerirle una idea tan sublime como tentadora a la líder de los navegantes».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「その考えは、俺にとって優美さに欠けるということもなかった。永遠の苦しみと憎しみを抱えた魂が一本の糸に絡み合う…エンピリアンそのものが、航宙士のリーダーにこんな愉快で嘲笑的なアイデアを囁いたのだろう」
languages.original_text: "The idea was not without elegance, to my mind. The entanglement of eternally suffering and hating souls in one skein... I suppose the Empyrean itself must have whispered such a delightful and taunting idea to the leader of the Navigators."

traits.locale_text: 「その考えは、俺にとって優美さに欠けるということもなかった。永遠の苦しみと憎しみを抱えた魂が一本の糸に絡み合う…エンピリアンそのものが、航宙士のリーダーにこんな愉快で嘲笑的なアイデアを囁いたのだろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Die Idee hatte durchaus etwas Elegantes an sich, wie ich finde. Ewiges Leid und hassende Seelen zu einer Strähne zu verflechten ... Das Empyreum selbst muss der Anführerin der Navigatoren diese wunderbare und spöttische Idee wohl eingeflüstert haben."
languages.original_text: "The idea was not without elegance, to my mind. The entanglement of eternally suffering and hating souls in one skein... I suppose the Empyrean itself must have whispered such a delightful and taunting idea to the leader of the Navigators."

traits.locale_text: "Die Idee hatte durchaus etwas Elegantes an sich, wie ich finde. Ewiges Leid und hassende Seelen zu einer Strähne zu verflechten ... Das Empyreum selbst muss der Anführerin der Navigatoren diese wunderbare und spöttische Idee wohl eingeflüstert haben."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "The idea was not without elegance, to my mind. The entanglement of eternally suffering and hating souls in one skein... I suppose the Empyrean itself must have whispered such a delightful and taunting idea to the leader of the Navigators."

languages.text: "Bana göre fikir, incelikten uzak değildi. Sonsuz ızdırabın karmaşası ve nefretle dolu ruhlar bir arada... Gök Diyar, Rotacıların liderine harika ve cezbedici bir fikir fısıldamış olmalı."
languages.original_text: "The idea was not without elegance, to my mind. The entanglement of eternally suffering and hating souls in one skein... I suppose the Empyrean itself must have whispered such a delightful and taunting idea to the leader of the Navigators."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
